text: When a cutoff value of BAL fluid total WBC count $ 510 / mL was applied to 100 pathogen - identified patients who had received antimicrobial agent for more than 24 hours , sensitivity was 36 . 8 % ( 95 % CI ; 21 . 8 - 54 . 0 ) , specificity was 71 . 4 % ( 95 % CI ; 56 . 7 - 83 . 4 ) , positive predictive value was 41 . 9 % ( 95 % CI ; 28 . 2 - 57 . 0 ) , negative predictive value was 66 . 9 % ( 95 % CI ; 59 . 9 - 73 . 2 ) , positive likelihood ratio was 1 . 29 ( 95 % CI ; 0 . 70 - 2 . 37 ) , and negative likelihood ratio was 0 . 89 ( 95 % CI ; 0 . 66 - 1 . 19 ) .
